subject: Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: Eric Atkins scored 16 points and host Notre Dame beat No. 8 Kentucky, 64-50, on Thursday night for its 41st victory in the past 42 home games.
snippet: Eric Atkins scored 16 points and host Notre Dame beat No. 8 Kentucky, 64-50, on Thursday night for its 41st victory in the past 42 home games.
